title: How to Make Pear Baby Food

steps.headline: Peel the skin off of the pear.
steps.description: The peel is recommended to take off for small infants, but because the skin is easily digestible, this is optional to do.

steps.headline: Cut the pear into quarters and de-seed the pears.
Place pieces in a blender or food processor to puree with a few drops of lemon juice.
Serve immediately or store in freezer.

text: Peel the skin off of the pear. The peel is recommended to take off for small infants, but because the skin is easily digestible, this is optional to do. Cut the pear into quarters and de-seed the pears.  Place pieces in a blender or food processor to puree with a few drops of lemon juice.  Serve immediately or store in freezer.
